transform.tRule: ######################################################################## # # Preemptive gemination for the American Library Association Transliteration for Amharic system. # # This transformation applies the Ethiopic-to-Ethiopic gemination mappings prior to # performing the regular Ethiopic-to-ALA-Latin transform. These mappings are # supported in the forward direction (Ethiopic-to-Latin) only at this time. # # Documentation for these transforms are given in the Ethiopic-Ethiopic-Geminated.xml, # and Ethiopic-Latin-ALA.xml files respectively. # ######################################################################## # :: Ethi-Geminated_Ethi ; :: Ethi-ALA_Latn ; # ########################################################################
